mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT e.employment_type AS employmentType, e.employee_id AS employeeId, e.korean_name AS koreanName, d.department_name AS departmentName, p.position_name AS positionName, vt.vacation_type_name AS vacationTypeName, vd.vacation_value AS totalVacationDays, (SELECT NVL(SUM(at.attendance_days), 0) FROM attendance at JOIN attendance_type att ON at.attendance_type_id = att.attendance_type_id WHERE at.employee_id = e.employee_id AND att.vacation_type_id = vt.vacation_type_id AND att.attandance_group_id = 1) AS usedVacationDays, (vd.vacation_value - (SELECT NVL(SUM(at.attendance_days), 0) FROM attendance at JOIN attendance_type att ON at.attendance_type_id = att.attendance_type_id WHERE at.employee_id = e.employee_id AND att.vacation_type_id = vt.vacation_type_id AND att.attandance_group_id = 1)) AS remainingVacationDays, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY e.employee_id) AS rnum FROM vacation_days vd JOIN vacation_type vt ON vd.vacation_type_id = vt.vacation_type_id JOIN employee e ON vd.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.department_id JOIN position p ON e.position_id = p.position_id WHERE (#{status} IS NULL OR e.status = #{status}) AND (#{employmentType} IS NULL OR e.employment_type LIKE '%' || #{employmentType} || '%') AND (#{departmentId} IS NULL OR e.department_id = #{departmentId}) AND (#{positionId} IS NULL OR e.position_id = #{positionId}) AND (#{vacationTypeName} IS NULL OR vt.vacation_type_name = #{vacationTypeName}) AND (#{searchKeyword} IS NULL OR e.employee_id LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR e.korean_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR d.department_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR p.position_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR e.employment_type LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%') ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vacation_days vd JOIN vacation_type vt ON vd.vacation_type_id = vt.vacation_type_id JOIN employee e ON vd.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.department_id JOIN position p ON e.position_id = p.position_id WHERE (#{status} IS NULL OR e.status = #{status}) AND (#{employmentType} IS NULL OR e.employment_type LIKE '%' || #{employmentType} || '%') AND (#{departmentId} IS NULL OR e.department_id = #{departmentId}) AND (#{positionId} IS NULL OR e.position_id = #{positionId}) AND (#{vacationTypeName} IS NULL OR vt.vacation_type_name = #{vacationTypeName}) AND (#{searchKeyword} IS NULL OR e.employee_id LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR e.korean_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR d.department_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR p.position_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR e.employment_type LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')

SELECT at.attendance_id AS attendanceId, at.employee_id AS employeeId, vt.vacation_type_name AS vacationTypeName, at.input_date AS inputDate, att.attendance_type_name AS attendanceTypeName, at.start_date AS startDate, at.end_date AS endDate, at.attendance_days AS attendanceDays FROM attendance at JOIN attendance_type att ON at.attendance_type_id = att.attendance_type_id JOIN vacation_type vt ON att.vacation_type_id = vt.vacation_type_id WHERE at.employee_id = #{employeeId} ORDER BY at.input_date DESC
